attributes.action: Give Woolwich Military Victim Funeral with Full Military Honours.
attributes.additional_details:
Let it be known that soldiers should never be afraid to show themselves on the Streets of this country. Let it be known we are proud of their heroism in times of peace and in times of war.

This petition seek to show we appreciate soldiers and that their honour is protected in the minds of everyone who rely in their courage.

This dead soldier and his funeral procession should one last time be paraded through the streets of London where we all will salute his presence and honour his departure.

Full Military Honours in the name of heroism and respect for the values of freedom and peace of the United Kingdom.
